positions.title: Senior Chief Manager - Startup Investments & Partnerships
positions.description_html:
Actively investing in fintech and digital ecosystem players globally. Collaboration with digital startups to co-create new products and manage ICICI Bank Group's digital strategy.

Managing portfolio of equity Investment of more than 100 crores in 6+ startups across business domains and stage of the round.

Managing relationship with startups in establishing synergies with ICICI Bank. Managing relationship with 50+ startups from Fintech, eCommerce, Transport and other key domains.

Generated profit of more than INR 760 million in FY20 through strategic tie-up with more than 17 startups

Conceptualized and launched co-lending arrangement with leading fintech companies in Auto finance.

Frequent networking with Investment groups, Venture Capital funds, Private Equity funds, Incubators/Accelerators, Investment Bankers and startups.

Investments:
ePayLater (Alternative lending) - Series A
True balance (Mobile payments, eCommerce) - Series B
KrazyBee (Alternative Lending) - Series C
Cardekho (Auto tech ecosystem) - Series D
CityCash (Mobile payments and Transport tech) - Series A

Key relationship with 50+ startups including
Spinny
Cars24
Cashbean
Nobroker
BharatPe
1MG
Indwealth
Zestmoney
Kissht
CarDekho

education.title: Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

projects: [{"title":"Fire fighting system based on Greek Fire design","start_date":"Nov 2013","description":"A water sprayer using two piston cylinder arrangements working in tandem (completely out of phase) to maintain a continuous stream of water flowing at high pressure, hand operated design based on Greek Fire cannons."},{},{},{"title":"Mechanical Water/Insecticide Sprayer","start_date":"Apr 2013","description":"Done as part of the course Production Techniques, the device (designed and fabricated by us) is basically a cart which, when pushed forward continuously by human effort, utilises the motion of the wheels to pump out water/insecticide (or any other liquid as needed)."},{},{},{},{"title":"Pedal Powered Portable Kitchen Appliance","start_date":"Mar 2013","description":"Designed and built as an APOGEE project, the appliance uses human effort to run various appliances found in the kitchen, including mixer, grinder, juicer, masher etc. Awarded first prize for the same in APOGEE 2013."},{},{}]
